landing.badge: Bina Marga Kota Jambi | Road Projects Management Ecosystem
landing.subtitle: SigiMarga is the authoritative technical command center for Bina Marga Kota Jambi. Automate S-Curve generation, manage complex BoQ structures, and ensure data integrity for critical road network assets.

features.subtitle: Engineering Standards
features.title: Built for Technical Accuracy
features.f1Desc: Eliminate manual spreadsheet errors. Upload your Bill of Quantities (BoQ) and SigiMarga instantly calculates real-time S-Curves and financial absorption metrics with mathematical precision.
features.f2Desc: Monitor road project distribution and verify site conditions. Use GPS-tagged documentation and spatial tracking to maintain an accurate, high-fidelity record of every road asset.
features.f3Desc: Generate professional, data-driven documentation in seconds. Export branded PDF reports that maintain technical integrity for stakeholder reviews and historical project audits.

dual.subtitle: Dual-Engine Control
dual.title: Systemic Transparency & Security
dual.pubDesc: Provide the citizens of Kota Jambi with an objective view of road project progress. A read-only dashboard for tracking road improvements and verifying project health through GPS-tagged photo evidence.
dual.staffDesc: A high-performance environment for authorized engineers. Manage contractor performance, update technical logs, and oversee the road project lifecycle with Supabase-powered security and real-time synchronization.

specs.subtitle: Technical Architecture
specs.title: Enterprise-Grade Road Management
specs.s1Desc: Engineered with Supabase and React Query for sub-second data synchronization across all devices. Eliminates latency in project oversight.
specs.s2Desc: High-performance responsive design allows field engineers to upload GPS-validated site evidence directly from any mobile device.
specs.s3Desc: Advanced Row Level Security (RLS) ensures that public visibility is maintained without compromising the technical integrity of the underlying dataset.

cta.desc: Advance your department into a digital-first engineering era. SigiMarga handles the technical complexity so you can focus on building a more resilient road network.
